digitalStemPlus.label: Digital STEM+ Graduate Count
digitalStemPlus.description: Custom aggregation of CNAEF codes beyond standard ICT (06) to include digitally-relevant engineering and science fields.
digitalStemPlus.disclaimer: This is our proprietary methodology. Official DGEEC publishes only standard CNAEF totals.

salaryIndex.label: Salary Index (Lisbon=100)
salaryIndex.description: Regional salary adjustment based on INE NUTS II wage data, normalized to Lisbon Metropolitan Area = 100.
salaryIndex.sourceData: INE indicator 0012653 (average monthly earnings by NUTS II)
salaryIndex.disclaimer: Index values are our derivation. INE publishes raw wage figures, not indices.

ictPercentage.label: ICT % of STEM
ictPercentage.description: Ratio of Core ICT graduates (CNAEF 06) to total Digital STEM+ graduates.
ictPercentage.disclaimer: Depends on our Digital STEM+ definition.

costComparisons.label: Cost Comparison Claims
costComparisons.description: Claims like '30% cheaper than Lisbon' are derived from COL index differences.
